org.apache.giraph.io.accumulo

类 AccumuloVertexInputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
        • org.apache.giraph.io.accumulo.AccumuloVertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - vertex id type
    V - vertex value type
    E - edge type
    所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, org.apache.giraph.io.GiraphInputFormat

    public abstract class AccumuloVertexInputFormat<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.giraph.io.VertexInputFormat<I,V,E>
    Class which wraps the AccumuloInputFormat. It's designed as an extension point to VertexInputFormat subclasses who wish to read from AccumuloTables. Works with AccumuloVertexOutputFormat

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  AccumuloVertexInputFormat.AccumuloVertexReader<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      Abstract class which provides a template for instantiating vertices from Accumulo Key/Value pairs.
